projects.title: stable-dataset
projects.description: An open-source Hugging Face datasets builder collection for vision and time-series benchmarks, with a custom download + caching pipeline so datasets can be defined and reproduced without bundling the raw files.

projects.title: stable-pretraining
projects.description: An open-source PyTorch framework for self-supervised pretraining, with real-time visibility into training quality through extensive logging and monitoring.

projects.title: stable-worldmodel
projects.description: An open-source framework for world model research built on top of Gymnasium, with reproducible data collection, flexible model training, and comprehensive evaluation tools.
